name: PINT GUI Devcontainer
postCreateCommand: python -m venv .venv && echo '/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages' > .venv/lib/python3.11/site-packages/system-packages.pth && . .venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install --no-cache-dir qtpy astropy numpy scipy jplephem matplotlib uncertainties loguru pint-pulsar pre-commit ruff black mypy commitizen detect-secrets pytest pytest-qt && pip install -e . && pre-commit install --hook-type pre-commit --hook-type pre-push --hook-type commit-msg && echo 'source /workspaces/pylk/.venv/bin/activate' >> ~/.bashrc
